title: Sergio Aguero: Real Madrid and Barcelona both watching situation at Manchester City closely as summer move nears
text:
AGUERO RACE IS ON Sergio Aguero: Real Madrid and Barcelona both watching situation at Manchester City closely as summer move nears 
Argentine striker was benched in favour of new signing Gabriel Jesus and has already hinted at exit By JAMIE GORDON 3 Sergio Aguero has hinted that he could leave City in the summer 
Keep up to date with ALL the La Liga news, gossip and transfers 
Marca claim Barcelona are especially keen as they know signing his Argentina team-mate would appease Lionel Messi and help in contract talks. 
And Real Madrid would also be desperate to sign Aguero, 28, as they look to dominate their rivals. 
A potential stumbling block is the contract extension he signed, worth around £13.5million per year until 2020. Barcelona have already tied down Luis Suarez and Neymar to new deals and, with Messi also due to the negotiating table , money is tight. 
Meanwhile, Atletico Madrid chairman Enrique Cerezo has blasted Aguero for the way he left the club for the Citizens. EPA Sergio Aguero has been on the bench for Manchester City’s last two Premier League games EPA Gabriel Jesus started in place of Aguero and hit two against Swansea Sergio Aguero's goal against West Ham shows the Gillette Precision Moment 
He said: "Aguero is the only player who left Atletico on bad terms, which was stupid. He arrived as a hero and left through the backdoor." 
Aguero requested a move away from Atleti just weeks after saying he would see out his contract after learning of City's interest. Gabriel Jesus gets winner for Manchester City against Swansea
